## Durable Task Schedulers  
  
<!--8b630f74-ffdd-4981-9182-40ddcf094199_begin-->

#### Configure auto purge retention policies  
  
Optimize storage by purging obsolete instance data, historical records, and payloads. Reduce backup overhead and mitigate uncontrolled data growth. Compact tables improve query performance, accelerate status retrieval, minimize index maintenance, and enhance cache utilization.  
  
**Potential benefits**: Improve query speed and increase storage efficiency  

**Impact:** Medium
  
For more information, see [Set autopurge retention policies for Azure Functions Durable Task Scheduler](/azure/azure-functions/durable/durable-task-scheduler/durable-task-scheduler-auto-purge?tabs=cli)  

ResourceType: microsoft.durabletask/schedulers  
Recommendation ID: 8b630f74-ffdd-4981-9182-40ddcf094199
